verses.name: Psalms 105:21
verses.text: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all his substance:

verses.name: Psalms 105:22
verses.text: To bind his princes at his pleasure; and teach his senators wisdom.

verses.name: Psalms 105:23
verses.text: Israel also came into Egypt; and Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham.

verses.name: Psalms 105:24
verses.text: And he increased his people greatly; and made them stronger than their enemies.

verses.name: Psalms 105:25
verses.text: He turned their heart to hate his people, to deal subtilly with his servants.

verses.name: Psalms 105:26
verses.text: He sent Moses his servant; and Aaron whom he had chosen.

verses.name: Psalms 105:27
verses.text: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.
